name: Overcome Your Fears
storyline:
You are exploring the story of 19-year-old Steve Jackson, who is tasked with house-sitting for his friends in a small town.

In this game, you play as Steve Jackson, a 19-year-old who takes a job house-sitting for friends while they are on vacation. What starts as a simple favor quickly turns into a chilling experience as unsettling events unfold in the quiet town. Little does Steve know, that these days will reveal dark secrets, and he must make choices that will change everything.
summary: Steve Jackson, an 19 year old highschooler is house-sitting for friends when he encounters eerie events in a small town. Dive into a psychological horror where shadows conceal secrets. Can you uncover the truth before it's too late?
